thread.title: Every 90s Filmy Kid Needs To Watch This Video Of Govinda And Raveena Tandon
thread.title_full: Every 90s Filmy Kid Needs To Watch This Video Of Govinda And Raveena Tandon

title: Every 90s Filmy Kid Needs To Watch This Video Of Govinda And Raveena Tandon
text:
facebook 224 SHARES 
Thanks to Instagram, our 90’s Bollywood icons don’t mind sharing their celeb-verified lives. One of our pre-millennium girl crushes, Raveena Tandon, has taken to the platform amid her stylist-led wardrobe and ultra-exclusive persona. Recently, when the actress shared a BTS video with the one and only legit 90s king, Govinda, we couldn’t help but get high-key nostalgic. The two can be seen coordinating their signature tapori moves, backstage, at Zee Cine Awards. One look at them, and you are instantly compelled to groove to your favourite 90s number (probably performed by these two only). Of all the No. 1 movies that these legends have starred in, Govinda-Raveena continue to be our number ones for life. 
Take a look at this video, and you will know what we are feeling.
